messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: AI Satellite Antechamber.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Janitorial Division

Cargo: One of our freighters carrying a bee shipment has been attacked by eco-terrorists. Can you clean up the mess for us?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Space Station 13 door subroutines. Severity level of 1. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Emergency Storage.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on the communications traffic on your station, we believe that all of the station's animals/bots has developed command level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Jerry Robinson. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.
